data.name: SVFI - Targeted optimization of RTX 30 series graphics cards
data.detailed_description:
SVFI - Targeted optimization of RTX 30 series graphics cards
- Enhance performance of video frame interpolation and super resolution by 50%+ for RTX 30 series graphics cards
- Reduce occupation of VRAM
- If speed of vfi is slowed down after this DLC is installed, ensure that your graphic cards are among RTX 30 series. If not, uninstall it.
data.about_the_game:
SVFI - Targeted optimization of RTX 30 series graphics cards
- Enhance performance of video frame interpolation and super resolution by 50%+ for RTX 30 series graphics cards
- Reduce occupation of VRAM
- If speed of vfi is slowed down after this DLC is installed, ensure that your graphic cards are among RTX 30 series. If not, uninstall it.
data.short_description: SVFI - Targeted optimization of RTX 30 series graphics cards - Enhance performance of video frame interpolation and super resolution by 50%+ for RTX 30 series graphics cards - Reduce occupation of VRAM
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, 1.5+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX® 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD® 3990WX
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX® 3090 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
